Four Seconds - a stopwatch iOS game

Four Seconds iPhone screenshots

An iOS game around a very simple, but entertaining concept: can you stop a timer at exactly four seconds?

I described the process of building this fun little project in the following article on Medium.

Be sure to check the game’s website at fourseconds.superblob.studio and download it on the App Store to play (it’s free - no ads).

The promo video I made for the launch

Some fun trivia:

  • Four Seconds got over 100 votes when launched on Product Hunt
  • from this thread on Hacker News I learned that people used to play these types of games on Casio watches back in the day

Let me know how far you can get on the all time leaderboard!
